message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. This product is truly one-of-a-kind and holds immense value. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1500000.  It's a significant investment, but I believe the potential return will be even greater. Let me know your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, my budget is quite limited. I am willing to pay up to $800000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $800000 simply doesn't reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $1200000, but I need to see some flexibility from your side as well.  This is a significant opportunity for both of us, and I believe a fair compromise is possible.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget constraints. I appreciate your offer, but I still believe that $800000 would be a fair price for this product. I hope we can reach an agreement closer to my maximum price.
